data.question: What is the empirical formula of MOF-CoNDI-py-2?

Is the MOF-CoNDI-py-2 crystal system monoclinic?
What is the space group of MOF-CoNDI-py-2?
Does the MOF-CoNDI-py-2 exhibit photoresponse intensities proportional to band intensities?

data.answer: It acts as a supporting ligand.

data.question: Was the MOF-CoNDI-py-2 synthesized using a solvothermal route?

Was the MOF-CoNDI-py-2 characterized using single-crystal XRD?
What is the effect of varying the angle between incident and detector polarisers in the Raman spectra for a MOF-CoNDI-py-2 crystal?
data.answer: It shows that the bands at 512 cm-1, 1124 cm-1, and 1377 cm-1 are mostly influenced by the varying angle.

data.answer: It is used as the metal centre.

What is the significance of the observed high responsivity in MOF-CoNDI-py-2?
data.answer: It indicates an efficient exciton dissociation mechanism.
